main module

main.placement_interface() → str | Response[source]

Placement interface, initialises game with user-specified player board

Required POST request json format: {

“Ship_Name”: [

“0”, // x-coordinate “0”, // y-coordinate “h” // orientation, must be “h” or “v”

] … // repeat for all ships, an example can be found in placement.json

}

Returns:

HTML template str on GET, JSON success message on POST

Return type:

str | Response

main.process_attack() → tuple[str, int] | Response[source]

Process attack with user-specified coordinates, generate AI attack

Required HTTP arguments:

x: a positive integer smaller than board_size y: a positive integer smaller than board_size

Returns:

JSON containing hit or miss bool and AI attack coordinates, returns a message and an HTTP error code when validation fails

Return type:

tuple[str, int] | Response

main.root() → str[source]

Game interface to render player and AI’s board on the browser

Returns:

HTML template str

Return type:

str
